product_name: Picnic At Ascot Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4
long_description: For a family picnic or couples date, bring along the insulated, fully equipped Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4 from Picnic at Ascot. It separates food and wine and keeps everything chilled. Made of durable polyester canvas with a hand grip and adjustable shoulder strap. Insulated main compartment has separate sections for food and drinks; a handy lid opening lets you retrieve a single bottle. Cooler is leak-proof, so may be used with ice to extend cooling time. Inside the fold-down front section are 4 each of acrylic wine glasses, melamine plates, stainless-steel 3-piece flatware sets (knife, fork and spoon) and cloth napkins. You'll also find a cheese knife and wooden-handled stainless-steel corkscrew/bottle opener/knife. Outside pocket on the Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4 from Picnic at Ascot stores small extras.
short_description: For a family picnic or couples date, bring along the insulated, fully equipped Deluxe Picnic Cooler for 4 from Picnic at Ascot. It separates food and wine and keeps everything chilled.
